infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture photos for custom art prints and AR visualization.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to select images for custom art prints and visual search.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Use Face ID for secure and fast checkout.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select images for custom art prints.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for custom art prints.
